actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend preference eligibility to the mother, father, and wife or husband of any individual who is a prisoner of war or missing in action.

summary.text: Extends Federal employment preference eligibility to the mother, father, and wife or husband of any individual who is a prisoner of war or missing in action. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 2108)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend preference eligibility to the mother, father, and wife or husband of any individual who is a prisoner of war or missing in action.
